article_title: Boy missing from downtown area found safe
article_text:
Authorities said the 8-year-old boy who went missing from the Tucson Meet Yourself event has been found safe and is now with family.

Nicholas Daniels was with a group participating in the event in downtown Tucson when he vanished around 2 p.m Saturday.

Copyright 2015 Tucson News Now. All rights reserved.
